scripts.test:android-release-ci: detox test --configuration android.emu.release -l verbose --headless --record-logs all --take-screenshots all
scripts.test:android-explicit-require-ci: detox test e2eExplicitRequire -c android.emu.release --runner-config e2eExplicitRequire/mocha.opts -l verbose --headless --record-logs all --take-screenshots all
scripts.e2e:ios: npm run build:ios && npm run test:ios
scripts.e2e:android-debug: npm run build:android-debug && npm run test:android-debug
scripts.e2e:android-release: npm run build:android-release && npm run test:android-release

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project ios/example.xcodeproj -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme example -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -project ios/example.xcodeproj -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme example -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios.none.build: xcodebuild -project ios/example.xcodeproj -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme example -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
